(_Jaa_) Nein (_Jaa_) Nein Willst du, bis der Tod euch scheidet Treu ihr sein für alle Tage? (_Jaa_) Nein (_Jaa_) Nein Willst du, bis zum Tod der Scheide Sie lieben auch in schlechten Tagen? vocabulary_list.example: I will see you all later.
I bought this gift for you.
This law separates the two sections.
To be or not to be, that is the question.
They are going to the park.
The concept of death fascinates many.
Do you want to go out?
We are going to the store.

intent: The song 'Du hast' by Rammstein explores themes of love, loyalty, and the complexities of relationships, particularly in relation to commitment and the idea of marriage vows. The recurring phrase 'Du hast' translates to 'You have,' and the song plays on the duality of affirming vows in a relationship while also questioning one's true feelings and commitments. It's a powerful and intense song that evokes strong emotions.
